languages.text: "Тебе сложно понять Детей Азуриана, и я не виню тебя в том — мы слишком далеки друг от друга". {n}Ирлиэт молчит несколько мгновений, подбирая слова.{/n} "Мон-кай слепо шагают навстречу будущему. Мы выбираем дорогу, руководствуясь наставлениями наших провидцев. Крударах был колыбелью сильнейших созерцателей грядущего — из их числа состоял круг наших правителей, и их слово было незыблемо, словно сама вселенная".

traits.locale_text: "Тебе сложно понять детей Асурьян, и я не виню тебя в том — мы слишком далеки друг от друга". {n}Ирлиэт молчит несколько мгновений, подбирая слова.{/n} "Мон-кай слепо шагают навстречу будущему. Мы выбираем дорогу, руководствуясь наставлениями наших провидцев. Крударах был колыбелью сильнейших созерцателей грядущего — из их числа состоял круг наших правителей, и их слово было незыблемо, словно сама вселенная".

languages.text: "You struggle to understand the Children of Asuryan, and I do not blame you for that — we are too different." {n}Yrliet says nothing for a few moments, choosing her words.{/n} "Mon-keigh walk blindly into the future. We choose the path, guided by our Farseers. Crudarach was the birthplace of the powerful watchers of things to come — our leaders were selected from among their ranks, and their word was set in stone, unshakeable like the universe itself."
languages.original_text: "Тебе сложно понять Детей Азуриана, и я не виню тебя в том — мы слишком далеки друг от друга". {n}Ирлиэт молчит несколько мгновений, подбирая слова.{/n} "Мон-кай слепо шагают навстречу будущему. Мы выбираем дорогу, руководствуясь наставлениями наших провидцев. Крударах был колыбелью сильнейших созерцателей грядущего — из их числа состоял круг наших правителей, и их слово было незыблемо, словно сама вселенная".

We choose the path, guided by our farseers. Crudarach was the birthplace of the powerful watchers of things to come — our leaders were selected from among their ranks, and their word was set in stone, unshakeable like the universe itself."

"You struggle to understand the Children of Asuryan, and I do not blame you for that — we are too different." {n}Yrliet says nothing for a few moments, choosing her words.{/n} "Mon-keigh walk blindly into the future. We choose the path, guided by our farseers. Crudarach was the birthplace of the powerful watchers of things to come — our leaders were selected from among their ranks, and their word was set in stone, unshakeable like the universe itself."

"You struggle to understand the Children of Asuryan, and I do not blame you for that — we are too different." {n}Yrliet says nothing for a few moments, choosing her words.{/n} "Mon-keigh walk blindly into the future. We choose the path, guided by our farseers. Crudarach was the birthplace of the powerful watchers of things to come — our leaders were selected from among their ranks, and their word was set in stone, unshakeable like the universe itself."

"You struggle to understand the Children of Asuryan, and I do not blame you for that — we are too different." {n}Yrliet says nothing for a few moments, choosing her words.{/n} "Mon-keigh walk blindly into the future. We choose the path, guided by our Farseers. Crudarach was the birthplace of the powerful watchers of things to come — our leaders were selected from among their ranks, and their word was set in stone, unshakeable like the universe itself."

languages.text: 「アシュリアンの御子らを理解するのは苦労するだろうが、非難はしない…我らは人間とはあまりにも違う」{n}ユリエットはしばらく何も言わずに言葉を選んでいる。{/n}「モン＝ケイは未来が分からぬままに歩む。我らは先見司の導きで道を選ぶ。クルダラは、先見の力に長けた者が生まれた地。我らの指導者は先見の階級から選ばれ、先見の言葉は石に刻まれた、この宇宙自体のように揺るがないもの」
languages.original_text: "You struggle to understand the Children of Asuryan, and I do not blame you for that — we are too different." {n}Yrliet says nothing for a few moments, choosing her words.{/n} "Mon-keigh walk blindly into the future. We choose the path, guided by our Farseers. Crudarach was the birthplace of the powerful watchers of things to come — our leaders were selected from among their ranks, and their word was set in stone, unshakeable like the universe itself."

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリアンの御子らを理解するのは苦労するだろうが、非難はしない…我らは人間とはあまりにも違う」{n}ユリエットはしばらく何も言わずに言葉を選んでいる。{/n}「モン＝ケイは未来が分からぬままに歩む。我らは先見司の導きで道を選ぶ。クルダラは、先見の力に長けた者が生まれた地。我らの指導者は先見の階級から選ばれ、先見の言葉は石に刻まれた、この宇宙自体のように揺るがないもの」

languages.text: “你并不了解阿苏焉的子嗣，我不怪你，我们之间的区别实在是太大了。”{n}伊莉耶特沉默了片刻，斟酌着自己的言辞。{/n} “猴子们盲目地走向未来，而我们在先知的指引下选择道途。无数能够洞察未来的强大之人诞生在了克鲁达拉赫，而我们的领袖就是从他们这样的人之中挑选出来的。他们的话语，就像这个宇宙本身一样不可动摇。”
languages.original_text: "You struggle to understand the Children of Asuryan, and I do not blame you for that — we are too different." {n}Yrliet says nothing for a few moments, choosing her words.{/n} "Mon-keigh walk blindly into the future. We choose the path, guided by our Farseers. Crudarach was the birthplace of the powerful watchers of things to come — our leaders were selected from among their ranks, and their word was set in stone, unshakeable like the universe itself."

traits.locale_text: “你并不了解阿苏焉的子嗣，我不怪你，我们之间的区别实在是太大了。”{n}伊莉耶特沉默了片刻，斟酌着自己的言辞。{/n} “猴子们盲目地走向未来，而我们在先知的指引下选择道途。无数能够洞察未来的强大之人诞生在了克鲁达拉赫，而我们的领袖就是从他们这样的人之中挑选出来的。他们的话语，就像这个宇宙本身一样不可动摇。”

languages.text: «Te cuesta entender a los hijos de Asuryan, y no te culpo; somos demasiado diferentes». {n}Yrliet guarda silencio durante unos instantes mientras busca las palabras adecuadas.{/n} «Los mon-keigh camináis a ciegas hacia el futuro. Nosotros escogemos la senda, guiados por nuestros videntes. Crudarach era la cuna de los poderosos profetas del porvenir: nuestros líderes fueron designados allí, y su palabra era ley, una ley tan indefectible como el propio universo».
languages.original_text: "You struggle to understand the Children of Asuryan, and I do not blame you for that — we are too different." {n}Yrliet says nothing for a few moments, choosing her words.{/n} "Mon-keigh walk blindly into the future. We choose the path, guided by our Farseers. Crudarach was the birthplace of the powerful watchers of things to come — our leaders were selected from among their ranks, and their word was set in stone, unshakeable like the universe itself."

traits.locale_text: «Te cuesta entender a los hijos de Asuryan, y no te culpo; somos demasiado diferentes». {n}Yrliet guarda silencio durante unos instantes mientras busca las palabras adecuadas.{/n} «Los mon-keigh camináis a ciegas hacia el futuro. Nosotros escogemos la senda, guiados por nuestros videntes. Crudarach era la cuna de los poderosos profetas del porvenir: nuestros líderes fueron designados allí, y su palabra era ley, una ley tan indefectible como el propio universo».

languages.text: "Ihr habt Mühe, die Kinder von Asuryan zu verstehen, und das verüble ich Euch nicht – wir sind zu unterschiedlich." {n}Yrliet schweigt kurz und überlegt sich ihre Worte genau.{/n} "Chem-Pan-Sey stolpern blind in die Zukunft. Wir wählen den Weg bewusst, geleitet von unseren Runenpropheten. Crudarach war der Geburtsort der mächtigen Beobachter dessen, was kommen wird – aus ihren Reihen stammten unsere Anführer, und ihr Wort war in Stein gemeißelt, unerschütterlich wie das Universum selbst."
languages.original_text: "You struggle to understand the Children of Asuryan, and I do not blame you for that — we are too different." {n}Yrliet says nothing for a few moments, choosing her words.{/n} "Mon-keigh walk blindly into the future. We choose the path, guided by our Farseers. Crudarach was the birthplace of the powerful watchers of things to come — our leaders were selected from among their ranks, and their word was set in stone, unshakeable like the universe itself."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Mühe, die Kinder von Asuryan zu verstehen, und das verüble ich Euch nicht – wir sind zu unterschiedlich." {n}Yrliet schweigt kurz und überlegt sich ihre Worte genau.{/n} "Chem-Pan-Sey stolpern blind in die Zukunft. Wir wählen den Weg bewusst, geleitet von unseren Runenpropheten. Crudarach war der Geburtsort der mächtigen Beobachter dessen, was kommen wird – aus ihren Reihen stammten unsere Anführer, und ihr Wort war in Stein gemeißelt, unerschütterlich wie das Universum selbst."

languages.text: « Vous avez du mal à comprendre les enfants d'Asuryan, et je ne peux pas vous en vouloir ; nous sommes trop différents. » {n}Yrliet se tait pendant quelques instants, le temps de chercher ses mots.{/n} « Les mon-keigh avancent à l'aveugle vers l'avenir, tandis que nous choisissons notre voie, guidés par nos Grands Prophètes. Crudarach était le berceau des puissants observateurs des événements à venir : nos dirigeants étaient choisis parmi eux et leur parole était gravée dans la pierre, aussi immuable que l'univers lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "You struggle to understand the Children of Asuryan, and I do not blame you for that — we are too different." {n}Yrliet says nothing for a few moments, choosing her words.{/n} "Mon-keigh walk blindly into the future. We choose the path, guided by our Farseers. Crudarach was the birthplace of the powerful watchers of things to come — our leaders were selected from among their ranks, and their word was set in stone, unshakeable like the universe itself."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez du mal à comprendre les enfants d'Asuryan, et je ne peux pas vous en vouloir ; nous sommes trop différents. » {n}Yrliet se tait pendant quelques instants, le temps de chercher ses mots.{/n} « Les mon-keigh avancent à l'aveugle vers l'avenir, tandis que nous choisissons notre voie, guidés par nos Grands Prophètes. Crudarach était le berceau des puissants observateurs des événements à venir : nos dirigeants étaient choisis parmi eux et leur parole était gravée dans la pierre, aussi immuable que l'univers lui-même. »

languages.text: "Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nı anlamakta zorlanıyorsun. Birbirimizden çok farklıyız, anlaşılır bir durum." {n}Yrliet, kelimelerini dikkatle seçmek için biraz duraksıyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh geleceğe körü körüne yürüyor. Bizse Ötesezenlerimiz rehberliğinde kendi yolumuzu seçiyoruz. Crudarach'ta, olacakları öngören güçlü kişiler doğmuştu. Önderlerimiz bu kişiler arasından seçildi ve sözleri, evrenin kendisi gibi sarsılmaz yasalar kabul edildi."
languages.original_text: "You struggle to understand the Children of Asuryan, and I do not blame you for that — we are too different." {n}Yrliet says nothing for a few moments, choosing her words.{/n} "Mon-keigh walk blindly into the future. We choose the path, guided by our Farseers. Crudarach was the birthplace of the powerful watchers of things to come — our leaders were selected from among their ranks, and their word was set in stone, unshakeable like the universe itself."

traits.locale_text: "Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nı anlamakta zorlanıyorsun. Birbirimizden çok farklıyız, anlaşılır bir durum." {n}Yrliet, kelimelerini dikkatle seçmek için biraz duraksıyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh geleceğe körü körüne yürüyor. Bizse Ötesezenlerimiz rehberliğinde kendi yolumuzu seçiyoruz. Crudarach'ta, olacakları öngören güçlü kişiler doğmuştu. Önderlerimiz bu kişiler arasından seçildi ve sözleri, evrenin kendisi gibi sarsılmaz yasalar kabul edildi."
